Detailed Description

template<class ModelInterface>
class imod::TMultiModelObserverBase< ModelInterface >

Basic implementation of a multiple model observer.

Definition at line 37 of file TMultiModelObserverBase.h.

template<class ModelInterface >
bool imod::TMultiModelObserverBase< ModelInterface >::OnAttached ( imod::IModel *  modelPtr)
virtual

This call back function will be called, if an observable object is about to be attached.

This function returns a true, if observable object is accepted by the implementation logic of the observer, otherwise the function returns a false.

Reimplemented from imod::CMultiModelObserverBase.
